articles.author: Louise Maureen Simeon
articles.title: ADB keeps Philippine growth outlook - Philstar.com
articles.description: Manila-based Asian Development Bank is keeping its economic growth outlook for the Philippines at 4.5 percent this year amid a sea of downgrades in Southeast Asia due to the resurgence of COVID-19 cases.

articles.title: These 2 young Montreal friends died in the Florida condo collapse. But only 1 has been found - CBC.ca
articles.description: Montreal friends Anastasia Gromova and Michelle Pazos were together in the Surfside, Fla., condominium that collapsed. While Pazos's remains were found, Gromova's family is still waiting for rescue teams to recover her body.
articles.content:
The trip to Florida was supposed to be a last vacation together for best friends Michelle Pazos, 23, and Anastasia Gromova, 24, before Gromova left for Japan to teach English.

articles.title: Gordon Ramsay's 1st Bar & Grill Restaurant In M'sia Will Be Opening In Q4 2021 - SAYS
